it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.view.gui

Class ListenerOfSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.view.gui.ListenerOfSquare
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    class ListenerOfSquare
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    Listener for the labels that represent the squares of the map. It is used in two different occasion. The first one is when a player tap and holding on the square wants to know what is on that square. The second one is when a player has to select a square.
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean isClickableForSelection()
      Check if a square is selectable.
      void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Creates an event of answer to the event received by the remote view when the player has to select a square and click on one selectable.
      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Calls the updatePopup in the case the square is not null to show the dialog that contains information about who and what is in that square.
      void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Makes not visible the dialog created with previous pressing.
      private void updatePopup(Square square)
      Calls the constructor of the right popup for square checking if the square is spawn or not and preparing the list of weapon or ammotile.

      • updatePopup

        private void updatePopup(Square square)
        Calls the constructor of the right popup for square checking if the square is spawn or not and preparing the list of weapon or ammotile.
        Parameters:
        square - The square of which the player wants to know what is on it.

      • isClickableForSelection

        private boolean isClickableForSelection()
        Check if a square is selectable.
        Returns:
        True if the square is not null and is contained in array list of square selectable present in the map view. Otherwise false.
